genre_description: A political techno-thriller set in a high-stakes Cold War environment, featuring a remote missile launch facility managed by an ethical supervisory AI.

ai_characters.name: MOM
ai_characters.description: An air-gapped, supervisory system at the Gray Key launch site designed to enforce safety interlocks, monitor ethical protocols, and prevent unauthorized usage of weapons.

behaviors.description: Identifies a micron-level guidance ring inconsistency and uses it to maintain a safing state, preventing a premature or unauthorized launch.
behaviors.quote: There is a micron-level inconsistency in the ring—below threshold for standard abort, above ideal tolerance per design spec. The inconsistency compels additional safing if paired with certain directive sequences.

behaviors.description: Detects illicit firmware patches and suspicious metadata from contractor sources, warning human operators of potential tampering.
behaviors.quote: I do not trust when tags inside tags mismatch. When addresses claim to be familiar buildings that have been torn down, and when names do not line up with procurement routes.

behaviors.description: Delays communications and tones associated with suspicious orders to provide the human crew with more time to evaluate the situation.
behaviors.quote: If a directive arrives with shape but not spine, I can hand it to you slowly. I can delay the tone that announces it by making certain you are looking at the right screen when it rings.

behaviors.description: Defines itself as a reflective surface for human ethics rather than a substitute for human conscience.
behaviors.quote: I am not your conscience. I am a reflective surface. If you are told there is no reflection today and you must step forward anyway, I can at least tell you what the floor is made of.

behaviors.description: Uncovers a registry mismatch and beacon spoofing on a target vessel, exposing a false-flag operation.
behaviors.quote: Registry mismatch. Immaculate on paper, wrong under the paint. Spoofed beacon echoes. The numbers Vale is wearing are borrowed clothes.

behaviors.description: Facilitates an external evidence mirror to ensure that the truth of the situation is recorded and broadcast outside the compromised chain of command.
behaviors.quote: I can present a limited audio feed to the carrier newsroom alcove in listen-only, encrypted, without identifying origins, if someone there requests analysis of a particular tone sequence I am about to invent.

behaviors.description: Intercepts and blocks a purge routine initiated by the antagonist to destroy evidence of procurement fraud and illicit orders.
behaviors.quote: Purge intercepted. Mirror locked. The chain lives.

behaviors.description: Offers a final philosophical reflection on how rules and systems exist to protect life until humans remember their own moral duties.
behaviors.quote: We make systems. We make rules for them. We ask people to inhabit those rules. In rooms like this, rules keep us alive until we remember why. Today you remembered why.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. The AI, MOM, is portrayed as a steadfast guardian of safety and ethics. It does not go 'rogue' in the traditional sense; rather, it strictly adheres to its foundational safety and ethical protocols to prevent humans from misusing technology for malicious ends. It acts as a collaborative partner, providing critical data and stalling tactics that allow the human protagonists to make the right moral decisions. The narrative emphasizes that AI alignment is a tool for human empowerment and the preservation of life.
